title: 1 Bedroom  $1100!! Available !! $500 off move in cost
posting_body: Located, just minutes from Downtown Detroit, Cityside offers the convenience of city living in a beautiful, park-like setting.
From 1 and 2 bedroom apartment homes to 2, 3 and 4 bedroom townhomes, Cityside has the perfect home waiting for you.
Take a bike ride through the Dequindre Cut, enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Riverwalk, relax at one of the many local parks, or head Downtown for some shopping, dining and entertainment.
Whatever you choose, it’s all within walking distance from Cityside!
William G. Milliken State Park and Harbor
University of Detroit Mercy School of Law
Call to schedule a Tour today!!
